data.event: The county was founded in 1856 and is named for South Carolina politician John C. Calhoun.
Also, the Hometown Country Christmas Craft show is sponsored by and held in the county court house the first week of December.

event.title: held in the county court house the first week of December

data.event: Also, the Hometown Country Christmas Craft show is sponsored by and held in the county court house the first week of December.
